description:
Against Natsumi`s orders, Keroro goes off riding in his brand new flying saucer that he bought for a steal online.  Unfortunately, the thing breaks down, and he`s lost by himself.  Will he ever be able to find his way home again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Perdu au milieu de la nuit
ケロロ 帰りたい 帰れない... であります
